ECSchema.description: Custom attributes to indicate BIS concepts.

ECEnumeration.description: Defines the layers in the BIS schema hierarchy.

ECEnumerator.name: Core
ECEnumerator.description: Layer for schemas that define the most fundamental concepts and key organizational strategies for all other BIS schemas.

ECEnumerator.name: Common
ECEnumerator.description: Layer for schemas that define abstract concepts and patterns used by multiple disciplines.

ECEnumerator.name: DisciplinePhysical
ECEnumerator.description: Layer for schemas that focus on physical/spatial and closely associated concepts, in light of a specific discipline.

ECEnumerator.name: DisciplineOther
ECEnumerator.description: Layer for schemas that define concepts from modeling perspectives other than physical, in light of a specific discipline.

ECEnumerator.name: Application
ECEnumerator.description: Layer for schemas that define concepts that no other schema would need or want to reference.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Declares the target layer in the BIS schema hierarchy for a schema.

ECProperty.description: Layer in the BIS schema hierarchy that a schema targets.

ECEnumeration.description: Defines the kind of linear measurement captured on an Entity.

ECEnumerator.name: GreatestEndToEnd
ECEnumerator.description: Measurement of an Entity from end to end; the greatest of its dimensions.

ECEnumerator.name: SideToSide
ECEnumerator.description: Measurement of an Entity from side to side.

ECEnumerator.name: BaseToTop
ECEnumerator.description: Measurement of an Entity between its base and its top.

ECEnumerator.name: Perimeter
ECEnumerator.description: Measurement of the outermost boundary of a plan-projected Entity.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Declares a property captures a linear measurement of an Entity.

ECProperty.description: Kind of linear measurement captured on an Entity.

ECEnumeration.description: Defines the levels of information for measurement values.

ECEnumerator.name: Gross
ECEnumerator.description: Level of information for measurement values without considering detailed deductions.

ECEnumerator.name: Net
ECEnumerator.description: Level of information for measurement values considering detailed deductions.

ECEnumerator.name: Unspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Unspecified level of information for measurement values.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Declares a property captures a volumetric measurement of an Entity.

ECProperty.description: Level of information for the volumetric measurements captured by the property.

ECEnumeration.description: Defines the faces of an Entity that area measurements are captured

ECEnumerator.name: PlanProjected
ECEnumerator.description: Declares that area measurements correspond to the projection of the Entity onto the X-Y plane.

ECEnumerator.name: Top
ECEnumerator.description: Declares that area measurements correspond to the 3D/unprojected surfaces of the Entity visible from the top.

ECEnumerator.name: Sides
ECEnumerator.description: Declares that area measurements correspond to the 3D/unprojected surfaces of the Entity visible any of its sides.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Declares a property captures an area measurement of an Entity.

ECProperty.description: Face of an Entity that the area measurements captured by the property apply to.
Level of Information for the area measurements captured by the property.
